languages.text: "Не представляете, насколько" {n}Морт проверяет оружие.{/n} "Хуже швали, которым варп загадил мозги, может быть только если варп собственной персоной лезет на палубу... эх, лучше даже не думать об этом, не звать лихо! Лорд-капитан, так что прикажете?"

traits.locale_text: "Не представляете, насколько" {n}Морт проверяет оружие.{/n} "Хуже швали, которым варп загадил мозги, может быть только если варп собственной персоной лезет на палубу... эх, лучше даже не думать об этом, не звать лихо! Лорд-капитан, так что прикажете?"

languages.text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: "Не представляете, насколько" {n}Морт проверяет оружие.{/n} "Хуже швали, которым варп загадил мозги, может быть только если варп собственной персоной лезет на палубу... эх, лучше даже не думать об этом, не звать лихо! Лорд-капитан, так что прикажете?"

traits.locale_text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the pox that the warp leaves on your brains, and that's when the warp itself starts flooding the decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

"You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the pox that the warp leaves on your brains, and that's when the warp itself starts flooding the decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

"You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

"You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

"You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: “你这话说得可太轻巧了。”{n}莫特检查着他的武器库。{/n}“如果说，有什么事情，比亚空间搞坏了船员们的脑子更糟糕，那就是亚空间本身就在我们的甲板上蔓延……呸，这种事情我根本连想都不该想，这太不吉利了！有什么命令吗，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: “你这话说得可太轻巧了。”{n}莫特检查着他的武器库。{/n}“如果说，有什么事情，比亚空间搞坏了船员们的脑子更糟糕，那就是亚空间本身就在我们的甲板上蔓延……呸，这种事情我根本连想都不该想，这太不吉利了！有什么命令吗，舰长大人？”

languages.text: «Ni se imagina». {n}Mort está comprobando su arsenal.{/n} «Solo hay una cosa peor que la disformidad corrompiendo las mentes de la tripulación, y es la propia disformidad arrastrándose por las cubiertas... ¡Bah, no debería ni pensar en ello, que da mala suerte! ¿Órdenes, Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: «Ni se imagina. {n}Mort está comprobando su arsenal.{/n} «Solo hay una cosa peor que la disformidad corrompiendo las mentes de la tripulación, y es la propia disformidad arrastrándose por las cubiertas... ¡Bah, no debería ni pensar en ello, que da mala suerte! ¿Órdenes, Lord Capitán?».

languages.text: 「あなたは実際の事態を把握していない」{n}モートは自分の兵器をチェックしている最中だ。{/n}「我々のクルーの頭を悩ませる<歪み>よりも悪い事が一つだけある。それは<歪み>自体が我々のデッキを這い回ることだ…ああ、それは考えないほうがいい…不吉だ！ロード・キャプテン、ご命令を？」
languages.original_text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは事態の半分も把握していない」{n}モートは自分の兵器をチェックしている最中だ。{/n}「我々のクルーの頭を悩ませる歪みよりも悪い事が一つだけある。それは<歪み>自体が我々のデッキを這っていることだ…ああ、それは考えないほうがいい…不運だ！ロード・キャプテン、ご命令ですか？」
「あなたは実際の事態を把握していない」{n}モートは自分の兵器をチェックしている最中だ。{/n}「我々のクルーの頭を悩ませる<歪み>よりも悪い事が一つだけある。それは<歪み>自体が我々のデッキを這い回ることだ…ああ、それは考えないほうがいい…不吉だ！ロード・キャプテン、ご命令を？」

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point, {n}dit Mort en inspectant son arsenal.{/n} Il n'y a qu'une seule chose qui soit pire que de voir le Warp corrompre l'esprit de notre équipage, et c'est de voir le Warp lui-même se répandre sur nos ponts... Mais je ferais mieux de ne pas y penser, ça porte malheur ! Quels sont vos ordres, seigneure-capitaine ? »
languages.original_text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point, {n}dit Mort en inspectant son arsenal.{/n} Il n'y a qu'une seule chose qui soit pire que de voir le Warp corrompre l'esprit de notre équipage, et c'est de voir le Warp lui-même se répandre sur nos ponts... Mais je ferais mieux de ne pas y penser, ça porte malheur ! Quels sont vos ordres, seigneure-capitaine ? »

languages.text: "Dabei wisst Ihr nicht mal die Hälfte." {n}Mort überprüft gerade sein Arsenal.{/n} "Nur eine Sache ist schlimmer als die Manipulationen des Warp in den Gehirnen unserer Crew, und das ist der Warp selbst, wenn er durch unsere Decks kriecht ... Ach, ich sollte gar nicht daran denken – das bringt nur Pech! Eure Befehle, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: "Dabei wisst Ihr nicht mal die Hälfte." {n}Mort überprüft gerade sein Arsenal.{/n} "Nur eine Sache ist schlimmer als die Manipulationen des Warp in den Gehirnen unserer Crew, und das ist der Warp selbst, wenn er durch unsere Decks kriecht ... Ach, ich sollte gar nicht daran denken – das bringt nur Pech! Eure Befehle, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: "Bu daha hiçbir şey." {n}Mort bir yandan cephaneliğine göz atmakla meşgul.{/n} "Öteboyutla karışmış tayfa beyninden kötü tek şey var, o da öteboyutun tüm güvertelere sızması... Neyse, böyle şeyleri aklımızdan çıkaralım. Kötü şans getirir! Emirleriniz Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: "You don't know the half of it." {n}Mort is in the middle of checking his arsenal.{/n} "There's only one thing worse than the warp addling the brains of our crew, and that's the warp itself crawling all over our decks... Bah, I shouldn't even think about it — it's bad luck! Your orders, Lord Captain?"
